---
title: "Formulas for converting between period, frequency, and angular frequency"
output: html_document
---


$$P=\text{period}$$
$$f=\text{frequency}$$
$$B=\text{angular frequency}$$


$$\begin{aligned}
B &= \frac{2\pi}{P} &&& B &= 2\pi f\\\\
P &= \frac{2\pi}{B} &&& P &= \frac{1}{f}\\\\
f &= \frac{1}{P} &&& f &= \frac{B}{2\pi}
\end{aligned}$$
